title: HASH DAO ($HASH) Whitepaper
body:
*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem :** 

A successful craft cannabis brand struggles to find funding that will be preserve the artisanal integrity of the brand. Scalability is an absolute for any company to grow

DAOâ€™s solution is to provide decentralization and democratization of the cannabis space, 

**Gatekeeping of the Cannabis Space = Integrity + Funding + Scalability**

*â€œDecades of marijuana prohibition and high incarceration rates for marijuana convictions has left many people out of the legal marijuana boom.â€*

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over $20 Billion and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**HIGHLIGHT FRESH FROZEN PROBLEM**

![Exclusive Libraries of Genetics & Phenos](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-8T4OrLTcNOJxW2vLerl-.jpg?height=1866&width=1536)

*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

> **HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M6C2p0sNHx37p783TEv9D.jpg?height=822&width=1125)

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

title: HASH DAO ($HASH) Whitepaper
body:
*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem :** 

A successful craft cannabis brand struggles to find funding that will preserve the artisanal integrity of the products, typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and Earth. 

Scalability is an absolute for any company to grow and distribute 

 

Often times, the funding leads to once corporate and VC capital

DAOâ€™s solution is to provide decentralization and democratization of the cannabis space, 

**Gatekeeping of the Cannabis Space = Integrity + Funding + Scalability**

*â€œDecades of marijuana prohibition and high incarceration rates for marijuana convictions has left many people out of the legal marijuana boom.â€*

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over $20 Billion and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**HIGHLIGHT FRESH FROZEN PROBLEM**

![Exclusive Libraries of Genetics & Phenos](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-8T4OrLTcNOJxW2vLerl-.jpg?height=1866&width=1536)

*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

> **HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M6C2p0sNHx37p783TEv9D.jpg?height=822&width=1125)

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

title: HASH DAO ($HASH) Whitepaper
body:
*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem :** 

A successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal integrity struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure

A successful craft cannabis brand struggles to find funding that will preserve the artisanal integrity of the products. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

**Gatekeeping of the Cannabis Space = Integrity + Funding + Scalability**

*â€œDecades of marijuana prohibition and high incarceration rates for marijuana convictions has left many people out of the legal marijuana boom.â€*

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over $20 Billion and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**HIGHLIGHT FRESH FROZEN PROBLEM**

![Exclusive Libraries of Genetics & Phenos](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-8T4OrLTcNOJxW2vLerl-.jpg?height=1866&width=1536)

*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

> **HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M6C2p0sNHx37p783TEv9D.jpg?height=822&width=1125)

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QcqQLT4DyBHuQRaaputgr.png?height=560&width=997)

title: HASH DAO ($HASH) Whitepaper
body:
*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem :** 

A successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal integrity struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

*â€œDecades of marijuana prohibition and high incarceration rates for marijuana convictions has left many people out of the legal marijuana boom.â€*

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over $20 Billion and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**HIGHLIGHT FRESH FROZEN PROBLEM**

![Exclusive Libraries of Genetics & Phenos](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-8T4OrLTcNOJxW2vLerl-.jpg?height=1866&width=1536)

*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

> **HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M6C2p0sNHx37p783TEv9D.jpg?height=822&width=1125)

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

title: No one is building the metaverse.
body:
### 1. The metaverse is interconnected

These companies are not building the metaverse, they are building *metaWorlds.*

The metaverse is not built in siloes, not owned by a single company, nor exists on a single blockchain. Hence, no ***one*** is building the metaverse. NThe metaverse is by virtue of its tenents is open sourced, crowd funded, and a user generated experience. 

Users and their avatars can freely explore from world to world.

Metalistings (MLS) is the embodiment of this connected hyper reality.

### 2. Virtual worlds vs the metaverse

Virtual worlds have existed since the 2000s in games like World of Warcraft, Eve Online, Runescape, & Animal Crossingâ€¦

The difference now is ownership.

With NFTs, people could prove scarcity, non-fungability, and provenance.

If real estate was ownership in real life, then virtual land is ownership of the metaverse.

### 3. Digital scarcity is a myth

But the scarcity of attention in the IoT is irrefutable.

Like your iphone home page, valuable digital real estate exists, just in different mediums.

Web2 social media has shown us that people, with their finite attention, aggregate to social hubs.

Such is the case in the metaverse.

Coding new land doesnâ€™t mean people will go there - people go where other people are.

The scarcity of attention is the real reason why virtual real estate will continue to have value.

### 4. Good virtual property is like a top level domain.

Hotels.com was worth $11M in 2001. Web traffic, ease of access through SEO, is now foot traffic, and ease of access through genesis plaza. Presently, the virtual Manhattan is on discount.

### 5. Make new things old, and old things new

The easiest way to sell something new is to make it old.

Real estate is an old.

Drawing similarities between metaverses and real estate, weâ€™ll onboard the next billion users.

### 6. Since you cannot eat or sleep in virtual landâ€¦

Itâ€™s a place of social congregation and consumption. This is means that the metaverse is a new social layer. A place of experiences.

Land is only as valuable as the experiences that are on the land.

So there is no such thing, now at least, as residential real estate. Itâ€™s all commercial.

### 7. The metaverse is not escape, its a shift in consumer preferences

Game worlds have been a place of refuge and retreat for the business of daily life. If we bring capitalism and financialization of all things into the metaverse, then should there not be a metaverse for the metaverse where people can escape to? In any case, metaverse exodus is a shift in consumer preferences. With enough of a movement, we could see a shift in ecologically nonsustainable consumer preferences move towards more of a virtual consumptive behavior.  

### 8. Decentralized identities and proof of humanity will be the main two schools of thought that will clash in the metaverse

The third will be general AI. But before then KYC and pseudo-anonymity are in conflict. Identity within the metaverse is the only user input that is constant throughout all of the different worlds. Property rights is linked to identity. ZK proofs are integral to resolving these differences in the metaverse. 

### 8. If you put all the metaWorlds on one platform:

You make it easier to understand their similarities and differences. This overview takes the fear out of learning about the metaverse.

Once you aggregate enough users and worlds, new worlds will look to you to be a launchpad.

Like the NASDAQ, you will get to dictate what traits and entry requirements are needed to be defined as the next Initial Land Offering.

As more worlds come into existence that fit these requirements, these requirements will soon be the similarities that become the portals between each world.

Know that because of these boundaries, people will be more creative for a time. Many worlds will make money, but only a few will survive.

In the end most users will aggregate to a few of the worlds that remain.

These worlds will be interconnected, DAO governed, ushering in the real metaverse.

## We are early, there are betterverses on the horizon.

![metalistings is a portal to metaverse real estate.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YDAa2nP_ldvYOQzt0L9Er.png?height=628&width=960)

title: No one is building the metaverse.
body:
### 1. The metaverse is interconnected

These companies are not building the metaverse, they are building *metaWorlds.*

The metaverse is not built in siloes, not owned by a single company, nor exists on a single blockchain. Hence, no ***one*** is building the metaverse. The metaverse is, by virtue of its tenents, open sourced, crowd funded, and a user generated experience. 

Users and their avatars can freely explore from world to world.

Metalistings (MLS) is the embodiment of this connected hyper reality.

### 2. Virtual worlds vs the metaverse

Virtual worlds have existed since the 2000s in games like World of Warcraft, Eve Online, Runescape, & Animal Crossingâ€¦

The difference now is ownership.

With NFTs, people could prove scarcity, non-fungability, and provenance.

If real estate was ownership in real life, then virtual land is ownership of the metaverse.

### 3. Digital scarcity is a myth

But the scarcity of attention in the IoT is irrefutable.

Like your iphone home page, valuable digital real estate exists, just in different mediums.

Web2 social media has shown us that people, with their finite attention, aggregate to social hubs.

Such is the case in the metaverse.

Coding new land doesnâ€™t mean people will go there - people go where other people are.

The scarcity of attention is the real reason why virtual real estate will continue to have value.

### 4. Good virtual property is like a top level domain.

Hotels.com was worth $11M in 2001. Web traffic, ease of access through SEO, is now foot traffic, and ease of access through genesis plaza. Presently, the virtual Manhattan is on discount.

### 5. Make new things old, and old things new

The easiest way to sell something new is to make it old.

Real estate is an old.

Drawing similarities between metaverses and real estate, weâ€™ll onboard the next billion users.

### 6. Since you cannot eat or sleep in virtual landâ€¦

Itâ€™s a place of social congregation and consumption. This is means that the metaverse is a new social layer. A place of experiences.

Land is only as valuable as the experiences that are on the land.

So there is no such thing, now at least, as residential real estate. Itâ€™s all commercial.

### 7. The metaverse is not escape, its a shift in consumer preferences

Game worlds have been a place of refuge and retreat for the business of daily life. If we bring capitalism and financialization of all things into the metaverse, then should there not be a metaverse for the metaverse where people can escape to? In any case, metaverse exodus is a shift in consumer preferences. With enough of a movement, we could see a shift in ecologically nonsustainable consumer preferences move towards more of a virtual consumptive behavior.  

### 8. Decentralized identities and proof of humanity will be the main two schools of thought that will clash in the metaverse

The third will be general AI. But before then KYC and pseudo-anonymity are in conflict. Identity within the metaverse is the only user input that is constant throughout all of the different worlds. Property rights is linked to identity. ZK proofs are integral to resolving these differences in the metaverse. 

### 8. If you put all the metaWorlds on one platform:

You make it easier to understand their similarities and differences. This overview takes the fear out of learning about the metaverse.

Once you aggregate enough users and worlds, new worlds will look to you to be a launchpad.

Like the NASDAQ, you will get to dictate what traits and entry requirements are needed to be defined as the next Initial Land Offering.

As more worlds come into existence that fit these requirements, these requirements will soon be the similarities that become the portals between each world.

Know that because of these boundaries, people will be more creative for a time. Many worlds will make money, but only a few will survive.

In the end most users will aggregate to a few of the worlds that remain.

These worlds will be interconnected, DAO governed, ushering in the real metaverse.

## We are early, there are betterverses on the horizon.

title: HASH DAO ($HASH) Whitepaper
body:
*Updated : May 2022*

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem :** 

A successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal integrity struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

*â€œDecades of marijuana prohibition and high incarceration rates for marijuana convictions has left many people out of the legal marijuana boom.â€*

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over $20 Billion and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.

**HIGHLIGHT FRESH FROZEN PROBLEM**

![Exclusive Libraries of Genetics & Phenos](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-8T4OrLTcNOJxW2vLerl-.jpg?height=1866&width=1536)

*Solution?* Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

Creating community-ownership of the vertically-integrated $HASH Supply Chain of production, processing, distributing, and operating on-chain craft cannabis  compliance geared toward Web3 adoption. Information, data security, and their applications are essential for business optimization and transparency. Although there are many ERP solutions for the industry already, our governance will be centered around cannabis supply chain and DeFi dApps that utilize NFT-based SKUâ€™s to generate active product data and create on-chain interactions that comply with ESG metrics, paving the way for global regulations and the future of the cannabis space.

Developing Horticulture Public Goods : BIPOC Horticulture Initiative, Open-Source Library of Genetics, Strains and Phenos, Regenerative Farming Methods & Techniques, Cannabis Production, Processing, Entheogenic Cultivation, Medicinal Protocols, and a Community-Practitioner Directory

Community-Governance over the liquidity, yield-farming, and major-user decisions in the tokenization of HASH DAO. 

**DERO Data Privacy** **+ Tokenization of Security**

HASH DAO Governance is the future of the industry standard, and to do this we will start by partnering with one successful Emerald Triangle, Northern California craft cannabis-brand with community-staking of its future scaling of operations and expanding a compilation of automation protocols through smart contracts.

**ON-CHAIN SUPPLY NFTs + ACTIVE INVENTORY TRACKING + CRYPTO TRANSACTIONS = Web3 Point of Sale (PoS)**

**Worldâ€™s First Cannabis DAO Founded On**:

BIPOC-equity and engineered around community-development governed by craft cannabis operators, backed by IRL projects.

**On-Chain Protocols + Smart Contracts = The Automated Horticulture of Tomorrow**

Creating a future:

* Geared to the love and cultivation of the plant and Mother Earth
* Onboarding BIPOC leaders and creatives onto the blockchain
* Compensating intellectual property proportionally to fulfill smart contracts

> **HASH DAO = Power Back in Your Hands**

Reinvention of the Horticulture Supply Chain and Data Distribution via smart contracts that allow for automation and help individuals to create ownership over community-led projects, intellectual property, digital assets, and dApps.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M6C2p0sNHx37p783TEv9D.jpg?height=822&width=1125)

**First Wins for HASH DAO**

> â€œCommunity Ownership of Physical and Digital Assetsâ€

Minting a multi-tiered HASH DAO NFT with the top governance tier going for $10 K, raising a total of $11.5 M for an initial $HASH treasury. As funds become available, proceeds will immediately go to partnering with South Face Mangement to purchase over 30 acres in Mendocino and 40+ acres Humbolt County. This will include the scaling of a vertically-integrated nursery, farm, hash processing, and soon-to-launch retail of award-winning legacy products under Uncle Macâ€™s brand and South Face Farms Management.

**Project #1 :**  Carry out renovation on the farm and nursery to ensure full-scale ESG-metric compliance and how to bring all aspects of the farm and itâ€™s production on-chain, from SKU NFTâ€™s to utilizing energy consumption data for carbon credit checks. Partnering with Uncle Macâ€™s, a Northern California craft cannabis brand, & South Face Management, parent company to Flower Wheel Nursery, South Face Farms Cultivation, and Uncle Macâ€™s brand.

**Project #2 :** Onboard visual and 3D artists who will design branding and assets for the Metaverse and we develop cross-chain NFTâ€™s to be dropped on various play-to-earn games. We will also be acquiring digital plots of real estate to build â€œMetaverse farmsâ€ and â€œdigital dispensariesâ€ where a user can view the product, find out all of itâ€™s information, and have it eventually delivered through an on-chain transaction. Along with digital land we will also be investing in domain names, including various strain names, cannabis celebrities, and psychedelic culture. Explore liquidity pools and yield farming with assets and treasury.

**Project #3 :** For the third project, weâ€™ll be launching Uncle Mac's HASH House is an Emerald Triangle legacy project. This on-chain Hash House is the home lab for Uncle Macâ€™s production. We will also operate as a wholesale fresh frozen supply chain solution for transportation, storage, distribution and hash toll processing throughout the greater Emerald Triangle area.

**Project #4** : Getting $HASH in your hands. This is our farm-to-table craft cannabis buyers club providing direct-to-consumer access to exclusive SKUâ€™s from legacy brands in the Emerald Triangle. This will include obtaining a retail and event license to launch Nephewâ€™s Automated.

**Project #5 :** Aggregating a library of horticulture public goods & building the Biodiversity BIPOC Glamping Learning Initiative; start building Marijuana for Minorities ProgramÂ to co-create $HASH University creating content with some of the best small-batch growers and washers in the industry. (Community Online Education)

**Project #6 :** Nephewâ€™s will be applying for its event space license building the foundation for Akasha, an immersive psychedelic A/R Lounge for BIPOC community healing. The distribution and delivery will be a warehouse that will have an on-chain ESG-metric system in the back and a public access immersive art space in the front. We will also be looking into developing a portfolio of boutique cannabis bud and breakfasts in emerging global cannabis markets.

**Project #7 :** We will be finding ERP solutions to develop state-of-the-art horticulture automation and Web3 technologies, based upon on-chain governance and compliance, to pave the way for the international industry standard by working towards meeting ESG-metric compliance. Our final goal is developing complete automation systems without compromising craft horticulture. From driverless deliveries, farm drone surveillance & data collection to utilize machine-learning and AI and to understand buyer behavior, horticulture improvements, growth optimization, etc.

title: Introducing Afropolitan: A Digital Nation
body:
## What is Afropolitan?

**Afropolitan is creating a Digital Nation to enable all Africans to build abundant lives.**

We are building a network comprising the best that Africa and the diaspora offer across art, finance, tech, and media. The Afropolitan Network is a Curator of Black and African:

* Talent (recruit, partner up)
* Culture (art, media, fashion)
* Capital (investment DAOs)
* Information (newsletter, blog, Twitter)
* Experiences (events, curated offerings)

Nevertheless, we believeÂ **our reach should exceed our grasp.** While it may be a humble Network today, Afropolitan will be the first-ever internet country in the future. But weâ€™re getting ahead of ourselves. First, you may be asking: why build a Digital Nation?

## Why weâ€™re building a Digital Nation

***Each generation must, out of relative obscurity, discover its mission, fulfill it, or betray it.***

â€” Frantz Fanon

Scarcity. Weakness. Poverty. Wherever we look and wherever we are, Africans worldwide are subjects, not citizens. Access to opportunity is scarce. Security is not guaranteed. For the most part, life is just about surviving, not thriving.

What would you do if you could do anything? If your future was boundless, notÂ *bounded*? What if your allegiance to a country did not depend on birth but on choice? In short: What would happen if you could come together with others to build a new society?

We know what youâ€™re thinking: â€œThis is unrealistic .â€ Everything around you, from the machine on which youâ€™re reading this manifesto to the country you live in, was once an idea in somebodyâ€™s head. They only came to be thanks to the work of millions of people, no more intelligent or better than you.

In this spirit, and with humility and hope for the future, we Afropolitans declare:

1. The nation-state experiment has failed for Black people worldwide. It has yielded nothing but poverty, genocide, police brutality, ethnic strife, inflation, weak government, and the failure of our ecosystems.
2. All people who call themselves free have aÂ ***fundamental right***Â to create the society they want by choice collectively. As the internet enables us to shrink space and form bonds across the planet, no person should live in a society by accident or force.
3. Finally, thatÂ **Abundance**Â and the destruction of scarcity is a North Star worth pursuing in any society which hopes to be both healthy and wealthy. Instead of the Land of Opportunity, we propose theÂ **Network of Abundance**: Abundance ofÂ **Tools**, Abundance ofÂ **Opportunity**, Abundance ofÂ **Joy**.

***To all future Afropolitans, our deal is simply this: join the Network of Abundance to be all you can be. Afropolitan is the canvas; you wield the brush.***

## Strategy: How do you build a Digital Nation?

Human beings are social animals. All that is good and noble about us stems from the fact that we need each other. In the most basic sense, building a new country is a process of scaling a social network around a shared mission and principles. Social networks are formed online and tend to stay there in our time. But what if we built a new network and migrated it into the real world via a city (or Network of cities)?

Crypto-philosopherÂ [Balaji Srinivasan](https://twitter.com/balajis)Â highlighted this as the most viable strategy to build such a country â€” which he calls aÂ [Network State](https://1729.com/how-to-start-a-new-country)Â â€” in the 21st Century. The Network State is a digital nation launched first as an online community before materializing physically on land after reaching critical mass.

The internet enables people to organize around shared values at scales that were previously unthinkable before the current century. If it were a country, Facebook would be the largest one globally. With the advent of cryptocurrency, the next Facebook will not be a social network with a passive online community but rather a full-blown digital republic coordinated by its native currency and a unifying mission.

What, then, could Afropolitan be? If it were a country, the African diaspora would be the 10th largest globally (\~ 150 Million). The diaspora is our North Star.

## 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/upjbTXTKVOGANrIHVvKZc.jpeg?height=608&width=1080)

## Master Plan

The best way to reform an obsolete system is by building a newer, more straightforward system. Afropolitanâ€™s objective is to solve the Crisis of Legitimacy experienced by Africans worldwide by building a new source ofÂ ***Legitimacy embodied in our Digital Nation***.

We will do so in four phases:

### Phase 1: Network

In Phase 1, we seed our Network by communicating a clear and energetic vision for the world we want to build. We will drop an NFT campaign outlining mythology for our new nation. Afropolitan NFTs will also grant members a digital passport, alongside access to events and future value-added services.

### Phase 2: Come for the Network, Stay for the Tool

**Speaking of value-added services:**Â Beyond the diaspora, scaling the Afropolitan Network will require providing maximal utility to our members. In Phase 2, we will launch theÂ **Afropolitan Super App**Â to bring together all the utilities within the Afropolitan ecosystem under one roof. Members will be able to monitor their holdings, send money to anyone across borders, earn by contributing to the DAO, and buy goods and services. Most importantly, they will be able to watch the Network as it grows around the world, thanks to a native media feed. The whole thing will feel like aÂ ***movement***.

### Phase 3: Minimum Viable State

Phase 3 is about preparing for our transition from the digital to the virtual. Our goal at this stage is toÂ **build up legitimacy through state capacity.**Â We will create a network of seed institutions to govern our Network, including subsidiary funds, organizations, and a developing internal economy.

### Phase 4: Foundation

Finally, in Phase 4, we leverage the Network, capital, and legitimacy accrued over the last 3 Phases to acquire land in negotiation with partner governments. The land piece will look like a â€œChinatown/Afropolitan Townâ€ where our members can establish a physical presence and create economic opportunities. At this stage, the Network State will serve as the â€œdigital capitalâ€ which governs our physical Districts. Eventually, we will build a more extensive network of Charter Cities akin to Singapore and Hong Kong.

## Iâ€™m in. Whatâ€™s next?

We are embarking on a long and taxing journey. Our destination may be clear, but the path is uncertain. As we launch Phase 1, Afropolitan is looking to onboard the most dedicated and ambitious people to join our fledgling Network. We care less about what youâ€™ve done and more about who you aspire to become and how we can all be better together.

To get involved, join our [mailing list](https://www.afropolitan.io/) first to get a sense of our [community](https://linktr.ee/afropolitangroup).

title: Building With Content
body:
By now the growth strategy for PRST should be pretty obvious--at least I hope it is. Otherwise, Iâ€™ve been spending a lot of time publicly creating content for myself. 

Creating content is the only way I know how to start growing a business.

It was a major part of how I grew my financial planing firm, **[RLS Wealth](https://www.rlswealth.com/)**. It was unintentionally how my co-founder, Taylor Schulte, and I started **[The AGC](https://advisorgc.com/)**. It was instrumental in establishing my small place in the financial planning community and bridging into other communities outside of finance. 

Iâ€™m not an aggressive salesperson. 

Iâ€™m not going to cold call. Iâ€™m not going to spend tons of dollars buying keywords or social media ads (at least not right now). Iâ€™m not going to force anything I do on anyone. Iâ€™d rather focus on those who are already with me and let other find me when the time is right. Creating content is perfect for this.

Iâ€™ll rely on educating, sharing, and just being myself in blogs, podcasts, videos, and other content to allow people who have an interest in what Iâ€™m doing find me. I believe if you put good content out, focus on giving information away and showing your expertise, and take care of the people working with or supporting you, good things will happen--I canâ€™t be convinced it wonâ€™t work. Iâ€™ve not only watched this play out for many people but Iâ€™ve experienced it myself--and once I saw that it works, there was no turning back for me.

*Disclaimer: Thatâ€™s not to say other ways of growing a business wonâ€™t work and that content creation should the ONLY way to market--I donâ€™t live in a world of absolutes.* 

Thankfully, I love creating content. If I could, Iâ€™d spend all day every day creating content of one form or another. Some days it would be writing the blogs for the topics I have written down in my ideas notebook. Others it would be having conversations with interesting people for the podcast. And sometimes it would be shooting videos and taking photos to create more Shorts showing what a passion led life can look like. 

For some creating content is work. For me, itâ€™s a creative outlet that just so happens to fuel my businesses.

## PRST Is A Little Different

Growing PRST through content is going to be a little different than it was growing RLS Wealth. When marketing a financial planning firm through education and content, a creator is not only able to begin to build relationships with their readers/listeners, who are potential future clients, but she is also able to establish herself as an expert and show her professional knowledge. The end result is eventually some of the readers/listeners will reach out to the advisor for help when they have a financial event that requires help. There is a service that is on the other end of the content.

If you **[revisit the blog post that discusses the current roadmap for PRST](https://mirror.xyz/prst.eth/l7gyXfwGNrrAyz1yHKQpR5OXHEAPpl6ulyjWF2kITps)**, right now itâ€™s only content and merchandise. But you can see there is more to come. 

For now, despite having an audience from my content as a financial advisor, Iâ€™m focused right now on helping individuals for whom PRST will resonate with find it. Iâ€™m sure there will be some overlap with RLS Wealth clients, All About Your Benjamins subscribers, and followers on social media but for the most part, PRST is starting from ground zero. 

And ground zero is blogging, podcasting, and creating videos.

## PRST Content Every Day

Beginning next week, PRST will be publishing content 7 days a week. 

Currently, there is The Daily PRST podcast which drops Mon-Thursday and should only take up 5-7 minutes of your time. On Fridays The PRST drops. On Saturdays The Weekly PRST hits inboxes **[(if youâ€™re not getting it you can sign up here)](https://skilled-experimenter-2294.ck.page/accf900c37)**. On Our PRST is an interview format podcast that does not have a regular cadence.

And starting June 12th, 2022 there will be a new audio-only show (titled TBD) exclusively on the new PRST Amazon Skill powered by our friends at WealthVoice. **[You can subscribe to the PRST Skill](https://alexa-skills.amazon.com/apis/custom/skills/amzn1.ask.skill.6016ffd0-81ae-4a50-aa58-dd68a0d00535/launch)** available on your Amazon devices and make PRST a part of your morning routine--each day the podcasts will be available on your Amazon device and it will be the only place to catch the Sunday episodes where weâ€™ll dive deeper into some of the spiritual components of your Pursuit. 

Next week weâ€™ll announce the PRST Skill, so youâ€™re getting a little sneak peek at whatâ€™s to come by reading the blog.

Iâ€™ll never stop creating content for PRST, even after the remainder of the roadmap is filled in and we are helping more individuals and families find and follow their passions to more fulfilled and happier lives.

For now, itâ€™s back to creatingâ€¦Iâ€™ve got a newsletter to finish for tomorrow morning.

Keep Pursuing,

JC

**Mission : Our mission is to cultivate Web3 community horticulture for the future of the cannabis space.** 

HASH DAO provides the first unified DAO solution forÂ craft cannabis farmers, industry professionals, investors, and BIPOCÂ communitiesÂ interested in theÂ cannabis space.

HASHÂ DAO has been created to allow integration into the emerging technologies of the blockchain and Web3 into the cannabis space. Focusing on farmers who put the plant first and under represented communities. To do this, we start by partnering with Uncle Mac's brand to create the worldâ€™s first Web3 Cannabis brand and community tooling of horticulture. Building a growing compilation of automation protocols using smart contracts, HASH DAOÂ Governance seeks to be the future industry standard.

**Problem :** 

A successful craft cannabis brand with artisanal integrity struggles to navigate the extractive nature of the traditional corporate company structure. Typically the capital solutions available often compromise the integrity and quality of the products at the expense of the small brands reputation, consumers, and the Earth. 

***Solution?***

Merging Web3 technologies with the cannabis space and creating a decentralized and democratized opportunities for brands to raise capital.

Highly Autonomous Systems of Horticulture (**$HASH**) : Utilizing smart contracts to automate and democratize production, supply chain, and governance in the cannabis & psychedelic industry.

*â€œDecades of marijuana prohibition and high incarceration rates for marijuana convictions has left many people out of the legal marijuana boom.â€*

> **Barriers of Entry + (Profit > People) = Current State of the Cannabis Space**

The multi-billion dollar cannabis industry is entering itâ€™s boom phase as more global cannabis markets arise and support for [U.S. federal legalization](https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3617) continues to grow support, in 2020 alone the cannabis space grew to over $20 Billion and is projected to 10x in the next decade.

Malpractice and gatekeeping of the cannabis industry has traditionally maximized profits at the cost of the plant or people, and in turn have provided barriers to entry to craft cannabis farmers and the BIPOC community.

Corporate cannabis companies operate and control the majority of the space, leaving legacy operators and small brands without capital solutions to scale their businesses and do not take into consideration all of itâ€™s stakeholders :

* The Growers & Phenotype Hunters
* Cannabis Processing & Technology
* Dispensaries & Deliveries
* Consumers & Community
* Mother Earth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXXVXLuIXOQoXtXRqzBXV.png?height=621&width=904)

The majority of the craft cannabis space, lacks in metrics and does not reward innovation or intellectual property; often operating at the cost of the patient, plant and the planet.

Cancerous pesticides, mold, and in-organic genetically modified flowers have all been out-dated practices utilized in current cannabis horticulture. This is largely due to a profit-driven model of the medicinal plant which has unjustly fined small legacy growers. Incarceration of marginalized communities for alternative medicine use at a disproportionate rate has since gate-kept entry into the space.

Farming, hash-processing, and cannabis tech are often driven to innovation by financial corporate investors, many times leaving most of the developers, designers, and legacy growers at the short end of the intellectual property stick. Elite genetics are identified by farmers through years of R/D sorting through phenotypes of each strain. Many times big brands exploit years of hard work and value that passionate master growers put in and often donâ€™t receive proper credit. Certain strains go on to become cultural identities that generate massive value, I.E. the creators and farmers innovate and the investors profit off their intellectual property, currently there is no on-chain authentication process.

Although track-and-trace is currently implemented, most cannabis brands are not completely transparent with their grow methods and techniques of production. There is also massive risk for current cannabis businesses as they have become targets for robberies the past few years. Legal brands are facing counterfeits and knock-offs in the black market. With the integration of digital identities, NFTs/Web3 purchasing, and automation, many of these problems are easily solved.
